item.title: A tantalising prospect - but can Norris now take advantage?
item.description: Lando Norris is on pole for the Mexico City Grand Prix - but can he take advantage and go top of the world championship standings?

item.title: The Papers: Andrew faces Commons 'humiliation' and 'Mansion tax raid'
item.description: A potential Commons debate about Prince Andrew's future and the chancellor's tax plans lead Sunday's papers.

item.title: Watch: Moment nuclear plant towers collapse during demolition
item.description: Two nuclear cooling towers in the town of Gundremmingen, Germany, collapse into large swirls of thick, white dust during demolition.

item.title: How to create three easy Halloween makeup looks with GlowUpâ€™s Axel
'Why are you booing?' - Furious Aspinall retains UFC title after eye poke
item.description: Tom Aspinall's first defence of his undisputed heavyweight title ends in bitter disappointment after an accidental eye poke from Ciryl Gane.
